title: New Construction Bi Level 2bed with den 3 bath and Expansive Roof Deck
description:
Welcome home to this elegant new construction bi level 2 bed/3 bath with den and expansive roof deck located in the bustling greater Kensington area (just West of Fishtown).  Enter into your open floor plan living space and kitchen with large plank engineered flooring, recessed lighting and ample natural light.  The kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, white shaker cabinets with auto soft close technology, black countertops with banquet seating, subway tile backsplash and pendant lighting.  2nd floor has a spacious den, bathroom and bedroom with double vanity ensuite.  All bathrooms have  a modern and sleek design.  Unit has an in unit washer and dryer, and central air & heat.  For taking in the summer days you have an expansive roof deck with panoramic views.  Right outside your doorstep are many conveniences from shops, entertainment destinations,  educational institutions to professional complexes.  With  the Berks Station of the Market-Frankford line just blocks away getting anywhere into the City is a breeze.   Lease Terms: Generally, first month, last month, and one month security deposit due at, or prior to, lease signing. Other terms may be required by Landlord. $45 application fee per applicant. Pets are conditional on owner's approval and may require an additional pet fee, if accepted. (Generally $500/dog and $250/cat). Tenants responsible for all utilities: electricity, cable/internet, $60/mo flat water fee. Building is fully electric so tenant has the added bonus of one less utility bill!
The rental requirements are as follows:
1) first, last and security to move in.
2) $45 non refundable application fee per applicant for credit and background check.
3) must be able to provide proof of income of at least three times the monthly rent.
4) 600 credit score; however if slightly below we can still accept with either a co signor or additional deposit.
5) if you have a co signor they will need to produce all the same info above which would allow you not to have to meet requirements 3 and 4.

title: No lease. Weekly rates starting at $620.
description:
A budget-friendly extended stay hotel in Bethlehem, PA
We invite you to experience the conveniences of home at WoodSpring Suites® Allentown Bethlehem. Our all-suite hotel with in-room kitchens is the perfect choice for your extended stay, whether it’s for a week, a month, or longer. We offer low nightly, weekly, and monthly hotel rates to help save you money. Plus, you'll enjoy free WiFi, guest laundry facilities and free parking at our 100% smoke-free, pet-friendly property, making your stay simple and hassle-free.
You'll enjoy quick access to a variety of destinations and attractions when you stay at our hotel in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. If you’d like to take advantage of public transportation, we're right on the 108, 217, 319, and 327 local LANta bus routes, while the Amtrak Bus Station is just 6 miles away. We're about 8 miles from the Lehigh Valley International Airport/ABE Airport. $50 to $100 Deposit.
Hotel at a Glance
5 miles to Lehigh Valley Hospital Muhlenberg
6 miles to St. Luke’s Hospital Anderson Campus
6 miles to Greyhound and Amtrak stations
8 miles to Lehigh Valley International Airport
Nightly, weekly and monthly hotel rates
Full kitchen in every room
Guest Rooms
Visit our extended stay hotel and select the suite layout that meets your needs. Each layout features a combination of double-/full-sized beds and sleeper sofas, as well as a dresser, nightstand and shelves. All suites also include a kitchen with full-size refrigerator, stovetop, microwave, cupboards and prep sink. Sit back and relax during your stay while enjoying free WiFi and a flat-screen TV with cable/satellite and a premium movie channel. Every-other-week housekeeping services are provided for long-stay guests. Additional items—including a linen exchange, cookware, dishes, and more frequent housekeeping—are available for purchase at the front desk.
Explore activities for all ages in Allentown Bethlehem
You're in the heart of it all when you stay at WoodSpring Suites in Allentown Bethlehem, where you'll find a variety of exciting attractions and destinations. History buffs will enjoy visiting the nearby Pennsbury Manor, the reconstructed estate of William Penn, who founded the Pennsylvania colony. We're also an easy drive to a number of family friendly activities, including Crayola Experience, Dorney Park and Wildwater Kingdom, and Lehigh Valley Zoo. Artists and creative types will want to check out the Banana Factory Arts Center, a collection of galleries and arts programs partly housed in a former banana distribution warehouse, about 9 miles away.
Show Less
Pet Policy
Service animals are welcome at no additional charge, must be registered at front desk. Limit 2 dogs, under 75 lbs. per room. No cats. Non-refundable pet fees, 50 USD a pet reg fee and 10 USD a pet per night charge for the duration of the stay.
Hotel Alert: Some hotel features and amenities may be modified or unavailable due to COVID-19. For more information, please call your hotel directly.
Amenities to help you stay awhile
WoodSpring Suites is an extended stay hotel with clean and comfortable rooms, and a professional, friendly staff that’s available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. Our 100% smoke-free hotel offers pet-friendly hotel rooms, free parking, guest laundry facilities and conveniently located vending machines. Daily, weekly and monthly hotel rates are available.

description: Welcome to this Gorgeous, ultra modern, sun dappled, 2 bed, 2 full bath corner unit, offering beautiful city views at Penn Treaty Residences at 1405 Frankford Avenue. This Amazing condominium is located at the very heart of Prime Fishtown, Philadelphia's most dynamic, vibrant and sought-after neighborhood! Situated directly behind Fishtown's historic, and newly remodeled, Rose Garden, enter this barely 3 year old, secure, 30 unit building and enjoy your urban oasis to the fullest. Entering #409 you will find rich mocha colored flooring throughout, a convenient coat closet, then your first, oversized, full bathroom. Each spacious bedroom offers great light and the primary boasts and en suite full bathroom as well. Your ultra-modern designed bathrooms both feautre Italian tile flooring and beautiful tiling andporcelain vanities. Down the hallway find an ideally located laundry closet on the way to your open concept kitchen/living room offering wonderful views. Note the double thick quartz countertops , high end GE stainless steel appliances including a double wall oven, cooktop stove and French door refrigerator, complete with an electric fireplace. Need parking? No worries add a deeded garage parking space for an additional $250 a month!This beautifully maintained building's amenities include a spacious common roof deck with spectacular 360 views including Center City and the Ben Franklin Bridge, storage bins for each unit, bike room in the basement, secure key fob entry and of course an elevator. Mere steps from La Columbe, Suraya, WM Mulherin's & Sons, Kensington Quarters, Ramona Susan's Bake Shop, Heffe Tacos, City Fitness gym and a myriad of other bars, restaurants, bakeries, souperies, specialty shops, nail salons, boutique clothiers and so much more. This is why Forbes magazine called Fishtown America's Hottest "New" Neighborhood in 2018 and it's only gotten better since. A 5 minute walk to the EL or multiple bus lines, easy access to I-76 & I-95, Walk & Bike Scores of 94 ("Paradise") so what are you waiting for? Make it yours today!
